Activity: Check emails and respond to any urgent requests. Catch up on industry news on data analysis and healthcare.
Meeting with @itpm-1 and @clinlead-1 to discuss their feedback on the report template. Take notes and ask clarifying questions. Discuss their recommendations for improving the template.

Revise the report template based on the feedback received from @itpm-1 and @clinlead-1. Incorporate their suggestions for improving clarity, accuracy, and relevance. Fine-tune the data visualizations and predictive modeling results.
Format the report template according to the hospital's branding guidelines. Choose appropriate fonts, colors, and layouts. Ensure that the report is visually appealing and easy to read.
Lunch. Grab some Italian food with @da-1 and @ehrdev-1

Prepare a presentation summarizing the key findings and recommendations from the report template. Practice the presentation to ensure a smooth and engaging delivery. Loaf around, watching random videos.
Present the report template to a small group of stakeholders, including hospital administrators, clinical staff, and public health representatives. Solicit their feedback and answer any questions.
Incorporate the feedback from the presentation into the final version of the report template. Make any necessary revisions or adjustments.
Finalize the report template and submit it to @itpm-1 for approval. Email @PEOPLE Finalized report template submission for approval.
